name: Boolean
literalDescription: One of the keywords true or false

name: String
literalDescription: A string of characters enclosed in single or double quotation marks

name: Array
literalDescription: Comma-separated values enclosed in square brackets

name: Object
literalDescription: Comma-separated key-value pairs enclosed in curly braces, where each key-value pair is formatted as <key>:<value>, and each key is a string
